main.name: Samitha Nanayakkara
main.bio: Hey there, I'm Samitha Nanayakkara. I'm a computer science enthusiast who loves specially Machine Learning, Hybrid Mobile Application Development, Healthcare and Biometric Security. Currently I'm working as a Temporary Lecturer in University of Sri Jayewardenepura, freelance mobile application developer and open source contributor. You can read more about myself below.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science (Hons) in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with a First Class Degree

work.description: Started my academic career as a Temporary Lecturer in Department of ICT, Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences, USJ.

work.title: Chief Operating Officer
work.description: Started working as chief operating officer of an emerging software solutions company.

publications.title: Automatic Motion Artifacts Recognition in Resting ECG/EKG to Identify Failed Tests using Machine Learning.
A Review of Literature on Iris Recognition.
